summary:
YouTuber MKBHD has just released a premium wallpaper app which is, apparently, something we’ve ‘all been asking for’. 

According to the App Store description, you will get access to:
“… hundreds of high-quality, full resolution art pieces for your smartphone”

By paying the MKBHD team the low, low price of
title: MKBHD’s scammy wallpaper app

summary:
